package org.javaro.lecture; public class Ex6_1 { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("윤지한"+"-"+"20181388"+"-"+"변수"); int a0=8; int a1=5; int a2=2; int a3=3; int a4=6; System.out.println("동일타입변수="+a0+","+a1+","+a2+","+a3+","+a4); int []a = new int [5]; a[0]=8; a[1]=5; a[2]=2; a[3]=3; a[4]=6; System.out.println("동일타입배열="+a0+","+a1+","+a2+","+a3+","+a4); } }
